snippet: BUCHMAN--Sylvan. The Board of Governors and members of Fairview Country Club note with profound sorrow the passing of our beloved longtime member Sylvan (Buck) Buchman. On behalf of all our members we express our deepest sympathy to his wife Shirl...
lead_paragraph: BUCHMAN--Sylvan. The Board of Governors and members of Fairview Country Club note with profound sorrow the passing of our beloved longtime member Sylvan (Buck) Buchman. On behalf of all our members we express our deepest sympathy to his wife Shirley of 72 years, sons Peter and John, and the entire family. Fredric C. Apter, President Bryna Sweedler, Secretary
